Description.Text: French Quarter Suites Hotel and French Quarter Annex Hotel are located just three short blocks from Bourbon Street. Most of our well-appointed and beautifully decorated suites include a large living room, full service kitchen, dining area and private bath with choice of king, queen, full or single beds. We also offer several two bedrooms suites, perfect for large families. Our inviting pool area provides an excellent way to unwind after a day of shopping on Royal Street and a quiet place to relax and refresh yourself after a night of adventure on Bourban Street. The French Quarter Annex consists of four restored 19th century Victorian Homes, that offer the character and ambiance that one looks for when considering a visit to historic New Orleans. Guests of the French Quarter Annex enjoy beautiful and spacious accommodations conveniently located just steps away from famous French Quarter restaurants, shopping and legendary nightlife. Families and large groups will find our one to six bedroom suites unique and an affordable alternative to more conventional lodging. The phone number listed is that of the 24-hour client support center for French Quarter Suites and French Quarter Annex. Located in the French Quarter, three blocks from Bourbon Street.

One Bedroom Executive Suite - Our one bedroom suites offer one king bed, comfortable living room, and most have a full kitchen. Standard amenties for all guest suites are microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, safe, cable tv, iron and ironing board. Pet Friendly Suites
One Bedroom Deluxe Suite - Our one bedroom Deluxe Suites offer two extra long double beds, comfortable living room, and most have full kitchen. Standard amenities for all guest suites are microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, safe, cable tv, iron and ironing board. Pet Friendly
Two Bedroom Suite - Our two bedroom Suites offer a comfortable living room. Both bedrooms have one extra long full size bed. Standard amenities for all guest suites are microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, safe, cable tv, iron and ironing board.
Run Of House - Double - Best available guestroom or suite, minimum 1 bedroom, 1 guest bed for up to double occupancy, microwave, refrigerator, safe, private bath. Photo displays typical guestroom
Standard Queen - Queen size bed, free continental breakfast, feature antique hard wood floors, hair dryers, Pet friendly rooms available upon request.
Standard Two Double - Two double beds, free continental breakfast, rooms feature antique hard wood floors, hair dryers, Pet friendly rooms available upon request.
